launcherModal.title: Official Launcher Instructions
launcherModal.step1Desc: Click the download button below to get the latest launcher file
launcherModal.step2: Close your SCUM game if it is open
launcherModal.step2Desc: Make sure SCUM is completely closed before proceeding
launcherModal.step3Desc: Run the downloaded launcher file as administrator
launcherModal.step4Desc: Use the browser button to locate your SCUM installation
launcherModal.step5Desc: Navigate to your SCUM game folder and select the SCUM.exe file
launcherModal.step6: Click on the green LAUNCH button
launcherModal.step6Desc: The launcher will handle everything automatically
launcherModal.note1: The launcher only copies mod files and downloads updated versions of mods, then opens the game. The launcher closes automatically after performing this action.
launcherModal.note2: You can connect to any other server even when using the launcher.
launcherModal.additionalInfo: The launcher works with any SCUM server - it only manages mod files and doesn't restrict which server you can join.

serverRules.title: Server Rules
serverRules.coreQuote: Environment and AI are the only enemies, not other players.
serverRules.importantNote: Staff decisions are final, and any violation can jump straight to permaban if severe enough.
serverRules.penaltyNote: Staff may escalate any case if damage to gameplay or community is high.
serverRules.welcomeMessage: Enjoy the challenge, respect your fellow survivors, and the AI will do the rest.
serverRules.fourthHit: fourth hit ‚Äì wipe of gear or base plus ban length chosen by staff
serverRules.extremeOffense: any extreme offense can be an instant permaban
serverRules.rule1_1: Any language is welcome, but do not flood chat with repeated messages or walls of text.
serverRules.rule1_2: Political or religious debates, racism, hate speech, harassment, griefing and impersonating staff are forbidden.
serverRules.rule1_3: Trades between players are allowed and encouraged. Use global chat or Discord trade rooms.
serverRules.rule1_4: Spam in VoIP (music, screaming) is not allowed.
serverRules.rule2_1: Turrets and mines must stay inside your walls, and walls must be completely closed for them to be allowed.
serverRules.rule2_2: No base raiding, no intentional player killing. Turrets may kill intruders, attack at your own risk.
serverRules.rule2_3: Do not unlock or destroy another player's door.
serverRules.rule2_4: Chests outside a locked-door room are free loot. Want safety? Put them behind a door AND LOCK IT.
serverRules.rule2_5: Do not leave items scattered on a trader's floor. Clean up or the staff will.
serverRules.rule2_6: You may move, return or steal a dead player's gear. Fair game.
serverRules.rule2_7: Combat logging is forbidden. Logging off or relogging to avoid death, combat, or AI pursuit is considered exploit abuse.
serverRules.rule3_1: Each player may own one motorized land vehicle and one motorized water vehicle. Squads with 2+ players get one additional ground vehicle.
serverRules.rule3_2: Locked vehicles are sacred if doors are closed. Any attempt to steal or tamper with one is bannable.
serverRules.rule3_3: Vehicles left unused for 7 days despawn automatically.
serverRules.rule3_4: Logging out with a vehicle inside a trader zone is forbidden.
serverRules.rule3_5: The server does not reimburse vehicles lost to glitches, accidents or explosions. Park wisely!
serverRules.rule4_1: One flag per player, maximum 300 build parts per flag.
serverRules.rule4_2: Prefab structures are allowed. No percentage cap, but do not block loot spawns, mission POIs or roads.
serverRules.rule4_3: No floating pieces, honeycomb spam or other exploit builds.
serverRules.rule4_4: The game already enforces terrain limits. Staff may delete illegal structures without warning.
serverRules.rule5_1: Stuck in terrain or found a locked spawn vehicle? Open a support ticket on Discord and include video or screenshots.
serverRules.rule5_2: Bug reports and evidence of rule breaks also go through the ticket system.
serverRules.rule5_3: Staff volunteers work in their free time. Be patient and polite.
